wikipedia_page.main:
Liam Marshall is an English rugby league footballer who plays as a winger for the Wigan Warriors in the Super League.
He has spent time on loan from Wigan at the Swinton Lions in the Championship.

response: Wigan Warriors: Sam Tomkins, Liam Marshall, Anthony Gelling, Oliver Gildart, Joe Burgess, George Williams, Thomas Leuluai, Frank Paul Nuuausala, Michael McIlorum, Tony Clubb, John Bateman, Liam Farrell, Sean O'Loughlin (captain).
